Articles.Content: Was just wondering when Kerbal Space Program get trees? Was just doing a return from the mun tabbed out while the capsule landed and when i opened it again i was in the middle of a forest.

Not sure i've seen people with tress in their game but never had them in mine. weird maybe a setting or something i'm missing.

~Gizmo~

Terrain Scatter

it adds trees on kerban and rocks on moons(<--I spelled this Mun at first) and planets.

It got trees back in 0.14.2.

That was over a year ago.

I think.
I have trees, it's a scatter setting somewhere that I have turned to max.
Is your terrain scatters on? I think that's why you see trees and stuff. (I never turned it on so that's why I'm not quite sure)
Those are terrain scatters, you can activate those in your options, Gizmo. I think you have to be in a certain spot on kerbin, I get shubberies every now and then but never forests.
Yeh I have terrain scatter enabled, thought it was just rocks on moons it added
all tree has chopped by million time rocket crash into kerbin
The deserts have cacti

Those are terrain scatters, you can activate those in your options, Gizmo. I think you have to be in a certain spot on kerbin, I get shubberies every now and then but never forests.

Herring?

(10 characters)
i got "terrain scatter" maxed out and only get bushes.

March last year...

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/2012/03/26/episode-five-arboreal-invaders/

The terrain scatter setting wont make trees show up as far as I know. There seems to be a bug that makes the trees disappear. But rarely they do appear:

This is it with the scatters set to 30%. All the trees vanished after the flight was ended.

PS- The rocks and grass do show up, its just the trees and cacti the don't.

Edited May 12, 2013 by RocketPilot573

Terrain scatter is still in an incomplete form right now, actually. On top of no physics enabled for the terrain scatter and the spawned rocks/trees/etc. not necessarily being rendered on the surface (more than a few floating boulders have been spotted), the terrain scatter feature will sometimes just plain not do anything at all.
Definitely terrain scatter. It's an option in the settings menu under graphics and its turned off by default.
Terrain scatter has trees. Maybe higher terrain detail as well?

Terrain scatter has trees. Maybe higher terrain detail as well?

Pretty much all the settings are maxed out, still no trees.

Pretty much all the settings are maxed out, still no trees.

It's a bug. I don't have trees either and I'm using maxed out settings.

Trees may appear at random times though.
I love the Terrain Scatters. They're so cool for cinematics.
*nevermind (10 char limit)

Well, that's why I've never seen any rocks. I suppose I have to turn the setting on, even if it lowers my FPS.

However, what if a rock appears inside my Mun base when I load up the game? Do things go boom?
The terrain scatters (trees, rocks, etc) don't have colision boxes - craft, rovers and kerbals just go through them.

My experience is that not only must i have terrain scatter on but i must also be in the correct locations of Kerbin, they appear in large forests and only in certain places, i have seen two types of tree, one is oak-like in appearance the other is a pine.

It also seems that they do not stay in place, i once parked next to a cactus for a tourist screenshot, went away to the space-center to check on something else and when i returned to the flight in question the position of the cacti around me had changed, this is however the exotic planet of Kerbin and not Earth, so they could be migratory cacti using little legs to get around, although i have my doubts.

Edited May 12, 2013 by Custard Donut (In Space)

They should have palm trees. I saw a video of 0.8 that had palm trees near the KSC, but I'm guessing these were handplaced and removed later when they added terrain scatter because they're not there anymore.
